sourcesContent:
import { Carousel } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CarouselHover } from "./styles"; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Collapse from 'react-bootstrap/Collapse'; export default function Carrossel() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const [textHeight, setTextHeight] = useState("auto"); const handleHover = () => { setOpen(!open); }; const handleTextResize = () => { const textElement = document.getElementById("example-collapse-text"); if (textElement) { setTextHeight(`${textElement.clientHeight}px`); } }; useEffect(() => { handleTextResize(); // Ajusta a altura da imagem inicialmente window.addEventListener("resize", handleTextResize); return () => { window.removeEventListener("resize", handleTextResize); }; }, [open]); return (
setOpen(!open)} aria-controls="example-collapse-text" aria-expanded={open} onMouseLeave={()=> setOpen(!open)} >

SISTEMAS COMPUTACIONAIS AVANÇADOS
